[ar:The Weeknd]

[00:00.00]Every Angel is Terrifying - The Weeknd
[00:14.70]Lyrics by：Matt Cohn/Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:29.41]Composed by：Matt Cohn/Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:44.12]Who if I cried out would hear me among the angels' order
[00:49.93]
[00:51.22]Even if they pressed me against their heart I'd be consumed
[00:55.96]
[00:58.78]For beauty is the terror we endure while we stand and wonder we're annihilated
[01:04.69]
[01:15.17]Every angel is terrifying
[01:16.10]
[01:28.01]Intense graphic sexy euphoric provocative edgy thought-provoking
[01:35.77]
[01:37.38]Technically and visually stunning
[01:38.37]
[01:39.77]A compelling work of sciencе fiction
[01:41.00]
[01:42.43]A suspenseful exposé
[01:43.56]
[01:45.54]Cinema like you've never seen it before
[01:46.91]
[01:47.93]The exotic bizarre and beautiful world of "After Life"
[01:51.55]
[01:53.01]And this is your invitation to enter
[01:54.27]
[01:55.35]Critics say After Life makes your current life
[01:57.56]Look like a total comatose snooze fest
[01:58.95]
[02:00.08]It's action-packed
[02:00.66]
[02:01.31]The future of everyone's fate
[02:02.17]
[02:02.72]Nigel and Frank call it a ****ing classic
[02:04.94]
[02:05.66]Arthur Fleminger says "I can't keep my eyes off the screen"
[02:08.50]After Life can be yours for only $4.95 with a subscription
[02:10.99]When you order the Best of Your Current Life Collection Series
[02:12.94]
[02:13.54]You will enter a world beyond your imagination
[02:15.20]
[02:16.43]A future out of control
[02:17.36]
[02:18.36]An experience you will never forget
[02:19.62]
[02:20.57]Don't say we didn't warn you
[02:21.69]
[02:22.36]The wait is over
[02:23.26]
[02:23.92]Call 1-800-444-4444
[02:27.31]That's 1-800-444-4444 now to order After Life
[02:31.88]
[02:32.39]$4.95 plus

data.trans:
[ti:Every Angel is Terrifying]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:14.70]//
[00:29.41]//
[00:44.12]如果我大声呼喊 谁会众位天使之中听到我的声音
[00:49.93]
[00:51.22]即使他们全心全意地守护我 我也会被吞噬
[00:55.96]
[00:58.78]因为美丽就是我们忍耐的恐惧 我们静静伫立着 思索着我们已经消失殆尽
[01:04.69]
[01:15.17]每一位天使都令人生畏
[01:16.10]
[01:28.01]热情洋溢 栩栩如生 性感迷人 令人欢欣雀跃 撩拨人心 大胆前卫 发人深省
[01:35.77]
[01:37.38]无论是技术上还是视觉上 都令人惊叹
[01:38.37]
[01:39.77]一部扣人心弦的科幻作品
[01:41.00]
[01:42.43]充满悬疑色彩的曝光场面
[01:43.56]
[01:45.54]你以前从未看过的电影
[01:46.91]
[01:47.93]《来世》里描绘一个带着异国情调 奇异又美丽的世界
[01:51.55]
[01:53.01]这就是你的入场邀请券
[01:54.27]
[01:55.35]评论家说 《来世》让你当下的生活
[01:57.56]看起来就像是一场酣睡盛宴
[01:58.95]
[02:00.08]内容惊心动魄
[02:00.66]
[02:01.31]包含着每个人命运的未来
[02:02.17]
[02:02.72]Nigel和Frank称之为经典作品
[02:04.94]
[02:05.66]Arthur Fleminger说 我无法让我的视线离开荧屏
[02:08.50]只需支付4.95美元的订阅费 《来世》即可成为你的专属
[02:10.99]当你订购《当下生活的精彩瞬间典藏系列》时
[02:12.94]
[02:13.54]你将会进入一个超乎想象的美妙世界
[02:15.20]
[02:16.43]一个失控的未来
[02:17.36]
[02:18.36]一段你终生难忘的经历
[02:19.62]
[02:20.57]别说我们没有提醒你
[02:21.69]
[02:22.36]等待已经结束
[02:23.26]
[02:23.92]请拨打1-800-444-4444
[02:27.31]即刻拨打1-800-444-4444 订购《来世》
[02:31.88]
[02:32.39]支付4.95美元
[02:33.04]
[02:33.59]就趁现在
[02:33.93]
[02:35.22]订购《来世》 额外支付3.79美元的运费和手续费
[02:37.54]
[02:39.15]就趁现在
